items.sentence: Why is Tom being nice to me all of a sudden?
Would it be OK if I drank a little more tea?
Would you like to do something this weekend?
Would you mind if I ask you a few questions?
Would you mind letting me see your passport?
I feel like doing something different today.
I fell asleep while I was doing my homework.
I felt relieved when my plane landed safely.
I felt sorry for her when I heard her story.
I would\'ve helped you if you\'d only asked.
I got here as soon as I heard you needed me.
As a matter of fact, his lecture was boring.
As far as I know, he has never come on time.
As far as I know, there is no such function.
I\'ve never seen that man before in my life.
If you turn left, you\'ll see a coffee shop.
Tom said he had 300,000 dollars in his safe.
Tom said he heard three gunshots that night.
Tom says he never thinks about Mary anymore.
Tom says he regrets having been rude to you.
